cast.overview: Peter Quill, still reeling from the loss of Gamora, must rally his team around him to defend the universe along with protecting one of their own. A mission that, if not completed successfully, could quite possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.
cast.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3

cast.overview: Decades since their successful television series was canceled, Chip has succumbed to a life of suburban domesticity as an insurance salesman. Dale, meanwhile, has had CGI surgery and works the nostalgia convention circuit, desperate to relive his glory days. When a former cast mate mysteriously disappears, Chip and Dale must repair their broken friendship and take on their Rescue Rangers detective personas once again to save their friend’s life.
cast.title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers

cast.overview: After failing to make it on Broadway, April returns to her hometown and reluctantly begins training a misfit group of young dancers for a competition.
cast.title: Feel the Beat

details.biography:
Kai Zen (born February 6, 2012) is an American actress known for portraying June in the 2020 Netflix film Feel the Beat, Pepper in Eureka!, and Phyla in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Kai Zen (actress), licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Kai Zen
